body.name: ZXWDDP 2024 New Hidden Camera Detector-WiFi Nanny Camera for Home Office Indoor Surveillance Camera with Motion Detection/Night Vision
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 53 mins
features: 【HD1080P&Night vision】The lens of this camera uses HD technology to capture videos and pictures in 1080P. The brilliant images can provide you with the ultimate experience. You can clearly see the face and some details. Keep clear evidence for you. The night vision feature can be a great help when monitoring things in dark environments. HD1080P with night vision helps you record everything in full HD even at night!

【Security camera】You can place it on any table and shelf (room, living room, office...)to monitor anywhere you want.Since it looks like an ordinary clock in appearance, it makes perfect sense to put it in these places. Monitor the environment without being discovered by others.Please note: SD card is not included in the package.

【Motion detection&Loop recording】These are two video recording methods. In motion detection mode, the camera will be in a standby state at ordinary times, and once motion is detected, it will automatically start recording video. This can save a lot of space on the SD card. This feature is useful to monitor the security of your home when you are traveling. In loop recording mode, the camera will keep recording video, and the newest video file will automatically overwrite the oldest video file.

【WI-FI remote live feed】As long as the camera is set up with 2.4G WIFI, you can view the live stream from your phone. Whether it's monitoring the safety of your family, your children, live streaming can help you the most. No matter where you are, you can always check on their safety. When no one is home during a trip, this feature allows you to see what's going on at home at any time. At work, the camera allows you to keep an eye on your babysitter's behavior and the condition of your children.

【Perfect after-sales service】 “100%Responsible for customer’s purchase” is our purpose. Feel free to contact us while you encounter some problem with the product. We support 3months of unconditional refund, 3 years of free replacement if the product is malfunctioning and lifetime free technology support.

productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 9 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Crystal clear night vision The covert camera has excellent 5M IR night vision, so you can see any detail and surface clearly, even in dark environments. It's the gadget to have for night-time safety. Keeping an eye on the safety of the elderly and children The safety of the elderly and children deserves attention when we are not around. Will the nanny you hire take care of the elderly or children as you want? Have they ever committed a theft? Is your husband/wife faithful to you? Collect the necessary evidence to avoid the involvement of a third party affecting your relationship.

Motion detection mode When motion is detected, your phone will receive a notification with an image. Simply use the app to see the details in real time, without worrying about missing anything. Check your pet at any time When you are tired of working, you can always turn on the camera and check on your pet. This will help you to relax. Keep your mood happy. Suitable for a wider range of applications This clock is capable of handling more than just indoor situations. Whether in the office or at home or in a shop. This camera will do its job perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great hidden clock camera
reviews.reviewText: This is really a good recommendation as this camera works so well.The good news is that it has no visible signs that it has a camera.This is my first time,but I will consider getting more after a few days of testing.I'm currently using it to monitor my kids and the video quality is much better than I expected.It is rechargeable and it can stay charged for a long time.Setup only takes a few minutes,and it's super easy.This is a very stylish clock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works well. Very modern, slick design. Highly recommend. Perfect way to keep an eye on the pets. Functional even solely as a clock, but the camera system is a perfect addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and powerful
reviews.reviewText: The small size is just right for my bookshelf and hides well.So far it's been working great,the product is as described,easy to install and set up,and I can monitor my home remotely while I'm at work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One that finally works!
reviews.reviewText: When I first receive it, I was about to return it. I feel like this is amazing after I find out how to set up everything. Great camera to be used for security. the pictures quality was also very clear. Worth it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Small device that works as advertised.No one will notice the camera,and the video quality is great for the price.The app works great,once connected to wifi you can watch the live stream without any issues,haven't had this issue so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, sleek design, user friendly
reviews.reviewText: The clock is compact, which is nice because it doesn’t take up a lot of space. The design is very sleek as well. My husband didn’t have a hard time setting it up. Although an SD card is necessary for recording (fyi). Very useful item to have, I would recommend for anyone needing a hidden camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This came very well packaged and very sleek. You cannot see the camera inside the clock unless you look super close and use light to reflect it. From a distance, there is absolutely no way anyone would be able to tell there is a tiny camera in the clock! Charged well and is super small so easy to travel with and use!
